name: setzkasten
description: CLI-first Font license governance tool (V1 scaffold).

scripts.build: npm run build -w @setzkasten/core && npm run build -w @setzkasten/manifest-lib && npm run build -w @setzkasten/events && npm run build -w @setzkasten/scanner && npm run build -w @setzkasten/policy && npm run build -w @setzkasten/quote && npm run build -w @setzkasten/cli
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test -w @setzkasten/manifest-lib && npm run test -w @setzkasten/events && npm run test -w @setzkasten/policy && npm run test -w @setzkasten/quote && npm run test -w @setzkasten/cli && npm run validate:contracts
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w @setzkasten/core && npm run lint -w @setzkasten/manifest-lib && npm run lint -w @setzkasten/events && npm run lint -w @setzkasten/scanner && npm run lint -w @setzkasten/policy && npm run lint -w @setzkasten/quote && npm run lint -w @setzkasten/cli
scripts.release:cli:publish:next: cd packages/cli && npm publish --access public --tag next
scripts.release:cli:publish:latest: cd packages/cli && npm publish --access public --tag latest
